text.name: modDescription
text.text: Improve the game with new features and an ingame menu where you will be able to change how the features work.

text.name: PAGE_LOGIN
text.text:
You need to login to access this page!
Login as server admin trough the Farm Management menu.

text.name: toolTip_SHOW_HELP_BUTTON
text.text: Whether or not the button to open menu should be shown in help window.

text.name: toolTip_VEHICLE_TABBING
text.text: Allow switching into vehicles (Tractors, cars, trucks etc).

text.name: toolTip_P_DISTANCE
text.text: How far away we can grab the object.

text.name: toolTip_P_HIDE_CHAT
text.text: Whether or not the chat window should appear when a player has written a message.

text.name: toolTip_P_HIDE_PLAYER_NAMES
text.text: Whether or not the player name should be showing above the character head.

text.name: input_X_CRUISE_DOWN
text.text: Game Extension: Adjust cruise speed down

text.name: input_X_CRUISE_UP
text.text: Game Extension: Adjust cruise speed up
